docs.snippet: The goal of our election unit is to help students read, watch, research and discuss in order to come to conclusions grounded in evidence about the candidates and the issues....
docs.abstract: The goal of our election unit is to help students read, watch, research and discuss in order to come to conclusions grounded in evidence about the candidates and the issues.

docs.snippet: As both presidential candidates campaign against it, the White House is negotiating with Republicans in Congress to ratify the largest regional trade agreement ever....
docs.lead_paragraph: As both presidential candidates campaign against it, the White House is negotiating with Republicans in Congress to ratify the largest regional trade agreement ever.
docs.abstract: Pres Obama, amid opposition, is planning final push for approval of Trans-Pacific Partnership, trade agreement with United States and 11 Pacific Rim nations; both Obama and congressional Republicans want to approve pact, but are delaying vote until after presidential election for fear of inciting even more rebuke from presidential nominees.

headline.main: Obama Readies One Last Push for Trans-Pacific Partnership
headline.print_headline: Amid Opposition, T.P.P. Gets a Final Push

docs.snippet: Of conspiracy theories and climate action....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of conspiracy theories and climate action.
docs.abstract: Paul Krugman Op-Ed column calls Donald Trump's visit to flood-affected parts of Louisiana ham-handed political exploitation of disaster; holds Trump's policies on global warming would exacerbate conditions behind increased frequency of extreme weather events; underscores degree to which presidential election will determine future of efforts to combat climate change.

docs.snippet: The head of Britain's opposition Labour Party in Scotland has joined calls to replace the organization's national leader, saying left-wing veteran lawmaker Jeremy Corbyn cannot heal deep divisions and win the next election....
docs.lead_paragraph: The head of Britain's opposition Labour Party in Scotland has joined calls to replace the organization's national leader, saying left-wing veteran lawmaker Jeremy Corbyn cannot heal deep divisions and win the next election.

headline.main: Labour Leader in Scotland Joins Calls for Party to Ditch Corbyn

docs.snippet: The oldest millennials — nearing 20 when airplanes slammed into New York City's Twin Towers — are old enough to remember the relative economic prosperity of the 1990s, and when a different Clinton was running for president. The nation'...
docs.lead_paragraph: The oldest millennials — nearing 20 when airplanes slammed into New York City's Twin Towers — are old enough to remember the relative economic prosperity of the 1990s, and when a different Clinton was running for president. The nation's youngest adults — now nearing 20 themselves — find it hard to recall a reality without terrorism and economic worry.

headline.main: Divided America: Diverse Millennials Are No Voting Monolith
headline.print_headline: Divided America: Diverse Millennials Are No Voting Monolith

docs.lead_paragraph: America's oldest millennials — nearing 20 when airplanes slammed into the World Trade Center — can remember the economic prosperity of the 1990s, and when a different Clinton ran for president. The younger end of the generation — now nearing 20 — can't recall a time without terrorism or economic worry.

headline.main: Divided America: Diverse Millennials Are No Voting Monolith
